Name: Grand Ginger
Ingredients: 45 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale
3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: Ginger ale adds a spiced intensity to the rich Grand Marnier in this refreshing long drink.
